content: this is an overlay mosaic pattern free flow had had an update please have a look and i hope its better for you and ive added an extra pdf of the border i created this pattern when i couldn t find one to match my daughters pillows it was my first attempt at designing this pattern has not been tested please contact me with any pattern problems you could make a whole afghan or just a baby blanket it s an 18 stitch repeat that can be repeated as many times as you wish you will need 2 different coloured yarns and could also add tapestry row of other colours if you wish beautiful photos by crocheters in my group amanda henry amy zaccardi josie horne and the bag by natasha frater and rug by sabine van zutphen van gils thank you fo allowing me to show your beautiful work you can join my facebook group for any help or just sharing photos https //www facebook com/groups/809381026680096/ ref=share_group_link i hope you enjoy sarah x
